DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety tolerability ascend multiple oral dos SAM-531 , investigational drug , healthy young adult elderly subjects.To ass pharmacokinetics ( PK ) pharmacodynamics ( PD ) profile multiple oral dos SAM-531 healthy young adult elderly subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics SAM-531 Healthy Young Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Men woman nonchildbearing potential age 18 45 year Elderly men woman age 65 year study day 1 . Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight ≥50 kg . Body weight elderly subject must ≥45 kg . Exclusion criterion : Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . Any clinically important deviation normal limit physical examination , vital sign , digital 12lead ECGs , clinical laboratory test result . Tobacco use consumption caffeinecontaining product ( e.g. , coffee , tea , chocolate , soda ) alcoholic beverage within 48 hour study day 1 , grapefruit grapefruitcontaining product 72 hour study day 1 , end inpatient confinement period . Elderly men woman age 65 year study day 1 . Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight ≥50 kg . Body weight elderly subject must ≥45 kg .
